version_description:
Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in the script editor
- iPhone now supports both landscape and portrait orientations
- Improved overall interface & controls
- Full support for the larger iPad Pro interface

Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in the script editor
- iPhone now supports both landscape and portrait orientations
- Improved overall interface & controls
- Full support for the larger iPad Pro interface

Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in the script editor
- iPhone now supports both landscape and portrait orientations
- Improved overall interface & controls
- Full support for the larger iPad Pro interface

- You can now create up to 16 scripts
- Improvements & fixes

- You can now create up to 16 scripts
- Improvements & fixes

- You can now create up to 16 scripts
- Improvements & fixes
More fixes & updates.
More fixes & updates.
More fixes & updates.
Bug fixes for Cut, Copy, Paste and underlining text.
Bug fixes for Cut, Copy, Paste and underlining text.
Bug fixes for Cut, Copy, Paste and underlining text.

New features, bug fixes and stability updates...

New features:
– Align text left, center, right and justify
– Tap the 'slow' and 'fast' icons to step up/down the speed value

Remember to enable automatic updates in the Settings app under "iTunes & App Store".

Get support at www.JoeAllenPro.com/help

New features, bug fixes and stability updates...

– Align text left, center, right and justify
– Tap the 'slow' and 'fast' icons to step up/down the speed value

Remember to enable automatic updates in the Settings app under "iTunes & App Store".

Get support at www.JoeAllenPro.com/help

New features, bug fixes and stability updates...

New features:
– Align text left, center, right and justify
– Tap the 'slow' and 'fast' icons to step up/down the speed value

Remember to enable automatic updates in the Settings app under "iTunes & App Store".

Get support at www.JoeAllenPro.com/help

– New feature: Adjustable side margins
– New feature: Select between "Continuous" or "Paging" scroll modes
– New feature: Triangular cue indicator
– Improved: Simplified font & text size controls (no longer need to edit your script)
– Improved: Choice of even larger font sizes
– Other minor stability, security and bug fixes

– New feature: Adjustable side margins
– New feature: Select between "Continuous" or "Paging" scroll modes
– New feature: Triangular cue indicator
– Improved: Simplified font & text size controls (no longer need to edit your script)
– Improved: Choice of even larger font sizes
– Other minor stability, security and bug fixes

– New feature: Adjustable side margins
– New feature: Select between "Continuous" or "Paging" scroll modes
– New feature: Triangular cue indicator
– Improved: Simplified font & text size controls (no longer need to edit your script)
– Improved: Choice of even larger font sizes
– Other minor stability, security and bug fixes

• You can now record videos and read the Teleprompter
• Various interface updates and improvements
• Added a countdown timer option before scrolling begins
• Added the option to use Sign in with Apple
• Added extra camera and resolution options for video recording
• Added a demo of the External Display Mode feature
• New improvements for trackpad and mouse support on iPadOS 13.4
• Fixed an issue related to opening a support ticket

• You can now record videos and read the Teleprompter
• Various interface updates and improvements
• Added a countdown timer option before scrolling begins
• Added the option to use Sign in with Apple
• Added extra camera and resolution options for video recording
• Added a demo of the External Display Mode feature
• New improvements for trackpad and mouse support on iPadOS 13.4
• Fixed an issue related to opening a support ticket

• You can now record videos and read the Teleprompter
• Various interface updates and improvements
• Added a countdown timer option before scrolling begins
• Added the option to use Sign in with Apple
• Added extra camera and resolution options for video recording
• Added a demo of the External Display Mode feature
• New improvements for trackpad and mouse support on iPadOS 13.4
• Fixed an issue related to opening a support ticket

• Fixed a scrolling issue while editing text on iOS 14
• Smoother teleprompter scrolling on devices with a ProMotion display
• Added option to change if dragging your script will stop the scrolling
• Added an option to increase the maximum scroll speed
• Added the option to display clocks for elapsed and remaining time based on your scroll speed.
• Improved the color picker
• Improved font picker
• Improved scrolling when using Paging scroll mode
• Adjusted the Teleprompter UI on smaller devices
• Background fixes and updates

• New: Video Backups will save your recent videos to your account
• Start/Stop scrolling with a connected keyboard without the Premium upgrade
• Help and FAQ UI is improved
• Fixed an issue related to deleting multiple scripts
• Added full localization for Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish and Swedish. Thank you to our translation contributors!
